title: Translating the Chinese client into English?
body: I've tried looking everywhere for this. I downloaded a localizer app that didn't work, and saw guides about changing parameters within files of the air folder. I don't know if its because of the newer client, but I don't see any files whatsoever in my air folder! I just moved to China and would like to play on the servers. I have the qq account all set up ready to go and can get into the game tutorial, but unfortunately I can't read anything. If anyone has an idea I would greatly appreciate it

replies.body: Each region has its own set of [languages ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language)that it supports.  Currently NA only supports English an we aren't able to offer support with third party programs that would modify your game files, or should you run into issues.  If you are playing on the NA region then you'll also want to download the regular client [here](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).  I hope that helps!

So there's no way to modify the game files to play in english with the CN client? I got the air client working in english by changing a few files' lines from CN to ENGLISH but after doing that I can't actually get into the game itself. If there's any kind of work around I would really appreciate the help!
